Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: 'Babylonia', 2: 'Support Force'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "So this is Support Force... Oh! I'm so sorry! Are you alright?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget accidentally bumps into a female Construct carrying a big stack of documents when she takes a step back to get a better view of the expansive training grounds.'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "N-no, no, no. It was my bad. I'm so sorry!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The female Construct quickly starts bowing without fixing her crooked glasses. Her braids almost touch her shoes every time she bows—'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "But I'm the one who bumped into you!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: '??', 3: "No, no. It's because I wasn't watching where I was going—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget stops the Construct from bowing again and quickly picks up the scattered files.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Well, now that we know each other... Hi! I've just been assigned to the Support Force as... as a Construct! Name's Bridget!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ruolin adjusts her glasses, looking uncertain, takes the files from Bridget, and starts speaking with a stammer.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: "I'm... I'm a Construct from Support Force. I... because I made some mistakes during a mission, I'm now being trained again...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Tears begin to well up in her eyes as she speaks.'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: 'I was so close to passing the training evaluation... I wanted to enter the Task Force...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hey, hey, don't cry!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Bridget panics. She's not sure how to handle this Construct's sudden burst of emotion."}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: "Ah, I-I'm so sorry. I shouldn't be like this...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ruolin sniffs her nose and forces herself to calm down.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "It's impossible to be perfect all the time—I've blown up quite a few vehicle fuel tanks before!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'At least now I have a chance to make it right!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Bridget gives Ruolin a reassuring pat on the shoulder.'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: "...Y-yeah. You're right!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Ruolin knows Bridget is just trying to comfort her, but she can't even remember the last time anyone cheered her on."}
{3: 'Deadweight.'}
{3: "That's what they all call her."}
{3: "Perhaps her terminal illness damaged her motor functions before she was turned into an Attacker Construct, and that's why she can never keep up with her team."}
{3: 'Only one person wholeheartedly believed in her, and believed that one day they would fight side by side.'}
{2: '???', 3: "Ruolin, you have to believe in yourself. One day, you'll join Task Force, and together, we..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Ruolin... Ruolin?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The brown-haired Construct's voice snaps Ruolin out of her thoughts."}
{3: 'She apologizes without thinking.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "You don't need to apologize all the time. It's not a good habit to have.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'The training camp is telling us to assemble. I better get going!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: "I-I'll come with you! I need to complete enough training hours and pass the assessment...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Wonderful! Let's do this together!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Ruolin is Bridget's first friend in Support Force."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Captain', 3: "Here, these files just came in. I'm handing them over to you. The training data for this batch of newcomers looks pretty good... Wait, why is this kid's strength so unusual?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Support Force Captain', 3: 'Are you sure this kid is assigned to the right team...? Hey, Trojan, come take a look?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She gives her colleague a gentle nudge.'}
{3: 'This Construct was assigned to Support Force just days ago. Some had reservations about the direct appointment, but she was definitely qualified.'}
{3: 'To avoid getting complaints, the captain only assigned her to train new recruits.'}
{3: 'She drags herself over to the desk and sees the name "Bridget" by the captain\'s finger.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'It says here that... she voluntarily joined Support Force?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Captain', 3: "Ha... Well, that's good. Support Force could use more people like her. If everyone were like Ruolin...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She lets out a weary sigh.'}
{2: 'Support Force Captain', 3: "I'll leave these new recruits to you.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "...I'll do my best.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The blue-haired Construct lets out a sigh as well.'}
{3: 'She barely made it out of that hellhole alive, thinking she could catch a break, only to find herself stuck in another.'}
{3: "It would be almost impossible to get out of this hellhole... Her frame isn't good enough to have an atmosphere-and-vacuum dual flight system."}
{3: 'She lets out another long sigh and mutters under her breath.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'Guess I have to ask for a raise...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Support Force Captain', 3: "...Hm? What's wrong?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "It's nothing... I just mean that all the newcomers look really promising.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She forces a professional, fake smile.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory3.jpg'}
{3: "Support Force's training protocol is very complete. Trojan may not be familiar with their rules, but creating training sessions using existing guidelines should be easy."}
{3: 'Trojan crouches next to an exhausted Ruolin with a defeated sigh.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: "This won't do... You're drawing too much attention...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget flips through Ruolin\'s training data with knitted brows. She\'s unsure how to continue training this supposedly "Attacker" Construct with abysmal physical capabilities.'}
{3: 'As a barely qualified "professional spy" herself, she\'d rather not have her name end up on the blacklist alongside Ruolin\'s.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Ruolin! Are you okay?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: "I'm so sorry! I-I didn't mean to hold everyone back. I just, I just...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ruolin', 3: "...I'm so sorry!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Hmm... I feel like your balance control system is a bit odd. This could cause trouble...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Instructor, may I team up with Ruolin? I'll be the team lead!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Trojan stands up and examines Bridget with a scrutinizing gaze.'}
{3: 'She had recognized the brown-haired girl on her first day as the new instructor of Support Force.'}
{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'I suggest you focus on yourself. She will drag down your average score.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "She won't cause me any trouble, ma'am.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'I can help her without compromising my performance. Ruolin is also my first friend here.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'Right, Ruolin?', 4: '2'}
{3: "The brown-haired girl's smile is so radiant that Ruolin gradually stops sobbing and gives a gentle nod."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ruolin', 3: "Thank you, but I don't want to be your burden...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Come on! Don't brush off my good intentions.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget reaches out to help Ruolin up, then gently dusts off her clothes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Ma'am, I will show Ruolin how to complete the rescue mission she was just working on!", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Trojan', 3: 'The rescue simulation system uses a standard frame version designed for Support Force training. It is different from your own frame, so you will need to adapt to it right away...', 4: '2'}
{3: "She boots up Support Force's real-time rescue simulation system once more."}
